And he gave this salutary advice not only to him, but also to all the others, to whom he told what was about to happen‚ urging strongly that they should not pursue the Turks too eagerly, since by the will of God they would conquer these barbarians anyway. He urged, also, that they should look out for ambushes, lest they fall into them and be killed. So much may be said about Godfrey and Raoul and the others following them.
